sn48.50:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava angesu viharati apanam nama anganam nigamo.
sn48.50:1.3: Tatra kho bhagava ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
sn48.50:1.4: “yo so, sariputta, ariyasavako tathagate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathagate va tathagatasasane va kankheyya va vicikiccheyya va”ti?
sn48.50:2.1: “Yo so, bhante, ariyasavako tathagate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathagate va tathagatasasane va kankheyya va vicikiccheyya va.
sn48.50:2.2: saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasavakassa etam patikankham yam araddhaviriyo viharissati—akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
sn48.50:2.3: Yam hissa, bhante, viriyam tadassa viriyindriyam.
sn48.50:3.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasavakassa araddhaviriyassa etam patikankham yam satima bhavissati, paramena satinepakkena samannagato, cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita.
sn48.50:3.2: Ya hissa, bhante, sati tadassa satindriyam.
sn48.50:4.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasavakassa araddhaviriyassa upatthitassatino etam patikankham yam vossaggarammanam karitva labhissati samadhim, labhissati cittassa ekaggatam.
sn48.50:4.2: Yo hissa, bhante, samadhi tadassa samadhindriyam.
sn48.50:5.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasavakassa araddhaviriyassa upatthitassatino samahitacittassa etam patikankham yam evam pajanissati—
sn48.50:5.3: Pubbakoti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn48.50:5.4: Avijjaya tveva tamokayassa asesaviraganirodho santametam padam panitametam padam, yadidam—
sn48.50:5.5: sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
sn48.50:5.6: Ya hissa, bhante, panna tadassa pannindriyam.
sn48.50:6.1: Saddho so, bhante, ariyasavako evam padahitva padahitva evam saritva saritva evam samadahitva samadahitva evam pajanitva pajanitva evam abhisaddahati:
sn48.50:6.2: ‘ime kho te dhamma ye me pubbe sutava ahesum.
sn48.50:6.3: Tenaham etarahi kayena ca phusitva viharami, pannaya ca ativijjha passami’ti.
sn48.50:6.4: Ya hissa, bhante, saddha tadassa saddhindriyan”ti.
sn48.50:7.2: Yo so, sariputta, ariyasavako tathagate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathagate va tathagatasasane va kankheyya va vicikiccheyya va.
